scripts.update: yarn run setup-web && yarn run setup-server && yarn run setup-systemd
scripts.setup-systemd: mkdir -p ~/.config/systemd/user/ && cp -f server/hexo.service icecast/icecast2/icecast2.service ~/.config/systemd/user/ && systemctl --user daemon-reload
scripts.enable: systemctl --user enable hexo && systemctl --user enable icecast2
scripts.disable: systemctl --user disable hexo && systemctl --user disable icecast2
scripts.start: systemctl --user start icecast2 && systemctl --user start hexo
scripts.restart: systemctl --user restart icecast2 && systemctl --user restart hexo
scripts.stop: systemctl --user stop icecast2 && systemctl --user stop hexo
